## Source: ossf-package-analysis (e69ac01e87147a835e5ab4045ff640d7fa9d2eb636aeb12eef6e1fc1577d021f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@get-bridge/bridge-string-utils' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
